kolambaa chiththampalam ee gadinar mawathe pihiti si.ef. da mel saha puthrayo pirawum haledi nawa okten 92ka paribhogikaya wetha nila washayen beda harima khanija thel karmantha amathi anura priyadarshana yapa, niyojya amathi sarana gunawardhana mahathwarunge pradhanathwayen sidukalaha.kese wethath indhana milehi wenasak sidunokota pawathi milatama okten 92 wargaye petral da alewi karana bawa khanija thel karmantha amathi anura priyadarshana yapa mahatha pawasiya.khanija thel karmantha amathyanshaya ha athwal badaganimin lanka indiyan oyil samagamada nawa petral beda harimata ekanga wu bawada hethema kiweya.wahana enjime jiwa kalaya wadikirima, adhika rathwimawimath ee mangin enjima palanduwimata athi awadhanama awama kirimath, enjima menma amathara kotas sandaha warshikawa wayakerena widesha winimaya yam pramanayakin awama kirima, parisara dushanaya awama kirima athulu wasi rasak okten 92 bhawithayata ganimen athwe.me wasara awasan wimata pera anekuth indhana wargada jathyanthara pramithiyata gena ena bawath ee mangin paribhogikayata ihala thaththwaye indhana bhawitha kirimata awasthawa himiwana bawath ee mahatha kiya sitiyeya.mita amatharawa khanija thel karmantha amathyanshaye wenas kam rasak sidukarana bawa pawasu amathiwaraya eya sewakayatath paribhogikayatath hithakara wana ayurin sidukarana bawa pawasiya.sapugaskanda piripahaduwe okten 92 kandaya petral nipadawime hakiyawa hodin pawathimath, jathyanthara washayen bhawitha kirimath hethuwen me thiranayata pamini bawada yapa mahatha kiweya.khanija thel karmantha amathyanshaye lekam aar. ech. es samarathunga, khanija thel sansthawe sabhapathi es.

sulu mugalan rajugen pasuwa rajakamata pathwuye kithsirimegha nam kumarayaya.ohu mugalan rajuge puthraya weyi.sinhala lekhanawala sandahan wanne me raju kuda kithsirimewan washayeni.mohuge kalayedi rajya thanthrayehi mahal awulak athi wiya.eyata hethuwa wuye me rajuge mawa mugalan rajuge nayan wasa di maramin siya puthuta namikawa rajakama pawara thamama rate palanaya athata ganimayi.eheth ayata ee sandaha daksha kamak thibune natha.enisa rajya palanaya boho se dushitha wiya.kramawath dadi adhikshanayak nothibunu nisa rajya niladharihu allas ganimin wasiyan peluha.janapadawala siti balawathhu biya saka nathiwama rajya nithi ullanghanaya kalaha.me andamata palana thanthraya bindawateddi maha janathawa balawath kalakirimata pathwi sitiyaha.me anuwa karallak athiwana thaththwayak udgathawi thibini.
